p.s: The excerpt from Barack Obama's speech he created while he was in Istanbul 2009 is about crossing borders and going abroad.
The text is divided in four paragraphs.
In the first Obama says that he came to Turkey because he wants to build a relationship between the USA and Turkey.
He wants that they show interest and respect to each other.

In the second paragraph the former president explainexplains that he always sees young Americans who volunteer or take part in something and he says that he as president havehas to motivate the Americans to do something like this and to welcome foreign students.
In the next paragraph he speeksspeaks about that going abroad to learn something help us to get more closer and save peace.
The last paragraph is about he orders the people in Istanbul and Turkey to go abroad for studying.
In the end Obama says that everyone of the young TurkeysTurks will find a partner and a friend in America.
All in all he wants that TurkeysTurks also going abroad for studying like the Americans.
